short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makdown File Reader is a tool that supports multiple themes and auto detecting and transferring markdown to html.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get source code at https://github.com/leewind/leewind-markdown-md

Features:

+ Transfer markdown file to html file in Chrome
+ Select different code themes
+ Auto detect the makrdown files and transfer files
